special_attacks: death roll (3d6+19 plus trip), swallow whole (3d6+13, AC 16, 13 hp)
melee: bite +18 (3d6+13/19-20 plus grab) and tail slap +13 (4d8+6)
feats: Improved Critical (bite), Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Run, Skill Focus (Perception, Stealth)
description: This reptilian behemoth, a crocodile of monstrous proportions, is large enough to swallow a horse in one tremendous bite.

sections.body: The immense sarcosuchus, or dire crocodile, is an enormous predator capable of catching and eating prey as large as the largest dinosaurs.

name: Crocodile, Dire
